job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtConsistently named one of the top DC startups to watch since 2016 Quorum builds software that helps public affairs professionals work smarter and move faster Our philosophy is peoplefirst whether were supporting team members in their careers or prioritizing our clients with a bestinclass customer success program Quorums clients use our tools to bring a modern approach to advocacy work in Congress all 50 state legislatures major US cities the European Union and more than a dozen countriesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAs a Fullstack Software Engineer you will report to an Engineering Manager and work the fullstack using tools like ReactRedux Django PostgreSQL React Native and much moreampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat Youll DoltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtFirst WeekltstronggtampnbspYoull ship new code to productionltligtltligtltstronggtFirst MonthampnbspltstronggtYoull write code at several levels of the stack from infrastructure to the API to the UIltligtltligtltstronggtFirst Six MonthsltstronggtampnbspYoull take ownership of an entire set of features and make decisions that impact many clientsltligtltligtltstronggtFirst YearltstronggtampnbspYoull help guide our team as we make broad technical decisions impacting our stack our products and the growth of the entire companyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout YoultstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtYou have at least 2 years of work experience at a company that produces software for end users as its primary functionltligtltligtYou have professional experience in front end languages such as HTML CSS and JavaScriptltligtltligtYou have professional experience in server side languages such as Python Java Go or NodejsltligtltligtYou have professional experience with any relational databases including writing SQL queries table and index design and system tuning for performanceltligtltligtYou are familiar with JavaScript frameworks such as React Angular or VuejsltligtltligtYoure a highlymotivated selfstarter who wants to make valuable contributions to a team from day 1ltligtltligtYoure an engaged learneryou want to expand your skills get your hands dirty and find solutions to challenging problems that require tradeoffsltligtltligtYou want to work in a fun environment where you can form real friendships with other professionals and where you have a strong sense of belonging at a growing startupltligtltligtYoure excited to pitch in where ever needed from helping in recruiting to supporting customersltligtltligtYou are looking to join a dynamic team immediatelyltligtltligtYou not only the care about the quality of code you write but also has a strong desire to build skills of those around through code review and mentorshipltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAbout the Software Development TeamltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWere a fastgrowing team that is dedicated to improving our people processes and platform The 35person team is composed of two backend software engineering teams two fullstack software engineering teams the Product Management team the Product Design team and an Information Security teamltligtltligtWe support many different products but internally think of them as one system with a single unified codebase Our goal is to build centralized systems that handle complex problems for multiple features and productsltligtltligtWere focused on doing the important things the right way  we write solid documentation test our code well design for scale and follow defined software development processesltligtltligtWe follow bestinclass security practices to safeguard our data and application against bad actors We regularly test and update processes and technology to fight complacency because we know good security is a continuous effortltligtltligtWe curate highquality datasets that are essential for effective mapping and tracking of the government and public affairs spaces Our datasets underpin our promise to give users the information necessary to make smart decisions that influence policyltligtltligtWe set rigorous quality standards and monitor them with a mix of programmatic and manual verifications to ensure users maintain a high degree of trust in our systemsltligtltligtWere very close as a team and invest not only in each others skills and careers but also in building real relationships with one another product development is a team sport and we believe that its better and more fun to work on a team of people that you know well and care aboutltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOur Work EnvironmentltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWe usually work in a vibrant sunlit space in our modern open concept office During the COVID19 health crisis most of our team members are working from home in locations around the world Team members will have the option to work from home until September 2021 Starting in September 2021 our team members will likely come into the office 12 days per weekltligtltligtOur office building is located in the heart of downtown DC easily accessible by metro bus and rideshares It is also in close proximity to great restaurants food trucks shopping and popular happy hour spotsltligtltligtOur team loves to spend time doing fun things outside of the office which we call Quorum Fun events Past Quorum Fun events have included apple picking yoga and wine tastingltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf youd like to learn what its like to have a real impact at a fastgrowing company that is changing the way the advocacy process works drop us a line Wed love to talk to youltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCompensation StructureltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBase Salary 1070000014500000 commensurate with experience  Signing BonusltligtltligtBenefits 401k match transinclusive health benefits 12weeks paid maternitypaternityadoptionfostering leave unlimited PTO and moreltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtQuorum Is Working to Advance Pay Equity What Does That Mean For YoultpgtltpgtIn an effort to continue to build a diverse and inclusive work environment that advances pay equity Quorum has implemented a No Negotiation policy for base salary for new hires for roles that are currently staffed by three or more team members This means that candidates for the Software Engineer role cannot negotiate Quorums base salary offerltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtHeres our promise to youltpgtltulgtltligtWe will not ask you what you are currently earningltligtltligtWe will consider years of relevant experience relevant professional certificationseducation and performance expectations in setting what we believe is a competitive fair base salary offerltligtltligtWe will be transparent about our compensation structure see above so that all candidates have equal access to compensation information and can make an informed decision about whether or not Quorum is the right workplace for themltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf you are interested in learning more about how negotiation impacts pay equity andor why other startups have decided to implement a No Negotiation policy of some type here are a few resources Project Include AAUW Ministry for Women MagooshltpgtltpgtNote Quorum does not endorse or verify any of the information provided in the resources on the impact of negotiation on pay equity We provide these resources simply to increase awareness of a topic we believe is important for both employers and candidates to considerampnbspltpgt
